paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Confirmed to have amyloidosis with positive immunohistochemical staining for Congo red and TTR.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: In addition, eight out of nine patients diagnosed with ATTR CA underwent TTR gene analysis, and all were found to have mutations in TTR.

functional_data.summary: All patients had positive immunohistochemical staining for Congo red and TTR.

variants.segregation_data: All patients with TTR mutations were diagnosed with ATTR CA.
variants.additional_notes: All identified variants were confirmed in patients diagnosed with ATTR CA.
key_quotes: Identified variants were p.Asp58Ala, p.Met33dup, p.Asp119Asn, p.Glu109Lys, and p.Thr79Lys, with p.Asp58Ala the most common variant (n = 4).

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text.
